description: A [menuPass](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0045) macro deletes files after it has decoded and decompressed them.(Citation: Accenture Hogfish April 2018)(Citation: District Court of NY APT10 Indictment December 2018)

external_references.description: Accenture Security. (2018, April 23). Hogfish Redleaves Campaign. Retrieved July 2, 2018.
US District Court Southern District of New York. (2018, December 17). United States v. Zhu Hua Indictment. Retrieved December 17, 2020.
external_references.source_name: District Court of NY APT10 Indictment December 2018
